alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 8:34AM CST until February 01 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Monticello. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Water appears in low areas in the extreme eastern portion of the city of Monticello. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 23.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 18.5 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Pearl River Monticello 22.0 23.6 Tue 8 am CST 22.0 20.9 20.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM CST.
